title: Idyllic Hilton Head Island Elegance with Three Championship Golf Courses, Five Restaurants & Spa
description:
Escape to a coastal retreat set on the sugar-white sands of South Carolina's Hilton Head Island. The resort boasts three championship golf courses and three refreshing swimming pools.

Savour gourmet cuisine at HH Prime, sip on a refreshing cocktail at the poolside Buoy Bar, or indulge in a soothing treatment at the Ocean Tides Spa. Or explore the island's charming boutiques, world-class golf courses, and the historic Harbour Town Lighthouse, all within easy reach.
offer_address: 23 Ocean Lane, Hilton Head, South Carolina 29928, USA

title: South Carolina Oceanfront Hilton Head Island Retreat with Pools, Onsite Dining & Bars
description: Embrace the coastal elegance of Sonesta Resort Hilton Head Island, a luxurious retreat tucked away along the idyllic shores of South Carolina. This top-tier oceanfront hotel offers a gateway to the area's best, with the historic lighthouse, upscale boutiques and world-class golf courses of Hilton Head Island moments away. Savour the taste of the South at Seacrest Restaurant and Terrace and slip into relaxation mode with your favourite drink in hand at Bayleyâ€™s Bar and Terrace.
offer_address: 130 Shipyard Drive, Hilton Head Island, South Carolina 29928, USA
